pred: Oscar and Payne will meet at Tristano's for a coffee in half an hour.

pred: Lauren is needed for work tomorrow. Pam will call in the morning to confirm. Lauren had a good holiday.

pred: Samuel is from India and speaks Telugu. He is 35 years old and calls Tim "Anna" which means elder brother in his language. Tim is 55 years old.
answers: Samuel's language is Telugu, which is spoken in south east India. It has nearly 90 million speakers; it's written left to right; it's based on Brahmin script. Teluguland has 23 provinces. It's quite poor. "Anna" means "elder brother" and Thammu or Thammadu - "younger brother". Tim's 55, Samuel's 35.
